name: Ridiculous Critters and How to Make Them (GGJ23)
name_original: Ridiculous Critters and How to Make Them (GGJ23)
description:
Do you have what it takes to create the ultimate Ridiculous Critter!?

Use your available research funds to purchase new DNA to combine with your critter to create a new unique Ridiculous Critter. 
Earn more research funds from participating in simulations.

You have a limited amount of science "goo" available so decide carefully before you press that big red re-sequence button. Re-sequencing allows you to reshuffle your chosen DNA.

Keep an eye on the countdown timer, you only have 1 minute to combine and re-sequence DNA before the testing simulation begins.

Revel in your scientific success or trace your critter back through its roots to determine where it all went wrong.

Coding: Clifford Corbin

UI: NanoCatSammy

Critters: May Contain Graphic Content

Created during Global Game Jam 2023

Playable online at nanocatsammy.com
